name: GODZILLA DESTRUCTION
description:
Become Godzilla and go on a worldwide rampage!
The exciting action game "Godzilla Destruction" has arrived!

Crush entire cities with just two simple actions:
Drag to move and release to attack!

〇Game Overview:
Skills: Destroy enemies to earn EXP and increase your level!
Learn new skills as you level up!
Upgrade Your Kaiju:
Use items earned from clearing stages and spinning gacha to make your Kaiju even more powerful!
Gacha:
Spin the gacha to win Kaiju and upgrade items!
World:
Make cities across the globe tremble in the wake of Godzilla's enormous power!
Shop:
Exchange gems obtained by clearing areas for upgrade items and powerful Kaiju!
Kaiju Field Guide:
Build your own original Kaiju collection!
